readability_reflection: I found string concatenation to be more readable because I was easily able to distinguish what was being joined together as well as where the spaces would be.
comprehension_debugging: String interpolation took me longer to understand and realize what was being joined together because I do not have much experience using interpolation.
preference_rationale: I would prefer string concatenation because that is what I recognize more easily and quickly.
learning_curve: Because of my lack of familiarity with string interpolation, I had a harder time understanding it compared to string concatenation which I have used previously in coding.
